mapper.insert: insert into exhibition_mention (mention_no, exh_seq, member_id, mention_content, mention_score, mention_regdate) values (seq_exhibition_mention.nextval,#{exh_seq}, #{member_id},#{mention_content},#{mention_score}, sysdate + 9/24)
mapper.update: update exhibition_mention set mention_content = #{mention_content} where mention_no = #{mention_no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from exhibition_mention where exh_seq = #{exh_seq}
